title: Insula dei Dipinti
description: A Hadrianic insula in Ostia Antica between the north wall of the castrum and the Tiber, comprising the houses of Jove and Ganymede, of the Infant Bacchus, and of the Paintings, arranged according to an L-shaped plan. Its fa√ßade faced onto two streets, forming a corner, while its inner sides looked out onto a large garden, without porticoes.

properties.description: Polygon representing the location of the Insula dei Dipinti, derived from an OpenStreetMap way.
